title: PERSON OF INTEREST Preview Trailer
author: NolanFans
comment: Didn't know Jesus could use a gun, huh
Season 3 is without a doubt the best season yet. Im halfway through now and something is happening pretty much on every episode. So cool. Big thumbs up and hope they'll keep going like this.
I love this show! One of the best ones :)
finally something worth to watch on TV !!!
excellent program, one of my favorites, I hope this series has much success and is actually engaging in every episode, so far it does quite well.
description: http://www.nolanfans.com A look at PERSON OF INTEREST, an upcoming show from Jonah Nolan and JJ Abrams, starring Jim Caviezel, Michael Emerson.
